name: @worldline/cron-integration
description: Cron job for the PSP Integration

scripts.build:all: npm run link:deps && npm-run-all build:deps:* && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd ../app && npm install && cd ../bc && npm install && cd ../db && npm install && cd ../psp && npm install && cd ../util && npm install && cd ../cron && npm install
scripts.install:ci:all: cd ../app && npm ci && cd ../bc && npm ci && cd ../db && npm ci && cd ../psp && npm ci && cd ../util && npm ci && cd ../cron && npm ci
